title: Aspire Insurance & Financial and the Indiana Chapter of the Ronald McDonald House Announce Joint Charity Effort to Support Families of Hospitalized Children
text:
Aspire Insurance & Financial, a full service insurance provider serving the greater Indianapolis area, is launching a joint charity drive with the Indiana chapter of the Ronald McDonald House to provide support for families with children receiving critical medical care
Indianapolis, IN (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Aspire Insurance & Financial, a locally owned insurance firm with offices serving Brownsburg and other communities near Indianapolis, is launching a joint charity effort with the Indiana chapter of the Ronald McDonald House, a nationally recognized non-profit that supports the families of sick and injured children.
For forty years, Ronald McDonald House has maintained facilities that offer rest and respite to the families of children who are hospitalized at nearby medical institutions, providing parents with a safe, clean, and affordable way to stay close to their loved ones in their time of need.
Ronald McDonald House reports that keeping families together during difficult medical procedures gives children dramatically improved recovery rates. The Indiana Ronald McDonald House facility allows approximately five thousand parents per year to stay close to their children as they receive critical care at nearby hospitals.
“I’ve seen the miraculous results of keeping families together during difficult times, and we are truly honored to assist the Ronald McDonald House as they continue their mission,” says Rob McBride, owner and manager of Aspire Insurance & Financial. “We’re asking our fellow community members to come out and help us support the Ronald McDonald House charity.”
Mobilizing an extensive network of personal and professional contacts, McBride and the Aspire team are reaching out to friends, family, neighbors, and clients in an effort to advocate for the Indiana chapter of the Ronald McDonald House and to gather donations that will be used to fund their efforts. In addition, the team is constructing a social media page that they hope will draw in more support from families across Indiana.
Aspire Insurance & Financial is also supporting several other charities in the Indianapolis area, and plans to work with a new charity every two months from here forward as part of an ongoing community involvement campaign.
Those who wish to stand with Aspire Insurance & Financial as they support the Indiana chapter of the Ronald McDonald House are encouraged to visit the Aspire Insurance website and make a personal contribution to the charity from this page: http://www.aspireindy.com/A-Home-Away-From-Home-At-The-Ronald-McDonald-House_15_community_cause . Those who wish to learn more about the other charities in and around Indianapolis being supported by the Aspire team are invited to bookmark their Community Causes page, located here: http://www.aspireindy.com/community-cause .
About Aspire Insurance & Financial
Serving Brownsburg IN, Aspire Insurance & Financial is committed to bringing local communities an insurance agency that understands their needs. Taking pride in its team of professionals, Aspire Insurance & Financial works with carriers to assemble a variety of products and services for its customers. From all of the products a typical consumer needs (home, auto, boat, ATV, etc.,) to all financial services products and tools (retirement, savings, long term care, disability, etc.,) and business insurance (liability, building, auto) to workplace and individual benefits (accident, critical illness, cancer, disability, life), Aspire Insurance & Financial covers all the bases for insurance needs in Brownsburg, IN and its surrounding areas.
